Title: Makes provisions regarding the employment of peace officers and police officers
Summary: Provides that any person convicted of any offense or violation of the civil rights law or the human rights law shall not be eligible for provisional or permanent appointment as a peace officer or police officer of the state or of any county, city, town, village or authority.
LawCode: Add ยง55-d, amd ยง75, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to employment of peace officers and police officers
